summary:
Add 3 new Khajit Female Marriage and Followers.
Trainers, skilled warrior and mage and marriageables.
descriptionHtml:
NOTE! Added Optional File to complete my MOD.
New Beta of Khajit Race Child Addition.

Adds two totally new boy and girl Khajit Race Children to Skyrim.
This is in early Stages!!! So not compare with other mods.
I made this only for complete my work with 3 female Khajit Marriageable MOD.

Vharje Kid is in Jorvaskrr whit Companions Armor
And
Nelkar Female Child is in Temple of Kynareth whit Iron Armor.

Both on Whiterun :)

Don't change clothes!!! This is a limit in Creation Kit for New races. I can't fix by now.
Use Child Clothes For Adult Based children, like other mods.
THIS IS NOT A COPY of other mods. This is my own test, totally new Race from Scratch.

You can add all new childs as you can. I only create one boy and one girl for testing, but you can add ton of them.
Uploaded two videos. First tests.
If you download and test, you could post your screenshots or videos here. You do not need my permission.Freely upload your tests. I'm happy if you happy use it!

Happy Testing!!!! ;)



Now, It's time for marriage with khajit female!

If your Player is a khajit race and only marry with J'Zhargo and you are interested in khajit females...
It's Your MOD!!! No more Console commands :)

3 New NPC's Followers with trainer in Destruction, Sneak and lockpicking and MARRIAGEABLES!!!

Yes, if you got an Mara Amulet and talk with one of these 3 beauty's, you can marry with her.

Renamon helps me alot testing my MOD. New names, location and most of news are from him. Thank You my friend!

I have ton of Mod's active and Original Steam Game. If you have no original, i can't help and i don't have idea if run on it.
Located at:

- TALI : is a LockPicking *Best Trainer and found her on Bannered mane in Whiterun!!!
*Best is better than Master Trainer.Can up to level 100

- RIKA : is the beautifull young-eager voiced with Ebony armor and is located in DragonsReach.
*Best Trainer in Sneak
*Best is better than Master Trainer.Can up to level 100

- LIARA : is a Destruction Expert Trainer located in Sleeping Giant INN in Riverwood.She's Magic expert and can help you in first quests. If you help Ralof-stormCloack and going to Riverwood with him.If you prefer the Magic style play, she is your best first follower. Forget Faendal or Sven bahhhh xD

All Marriageable! All can be your Follower! All can Live with you.

RECOMMEND to Uninstall First if you have installed before and reinstall, or you need to Start new game if you don't like to crash your current game. I Advised...
If you play an started game, you can give some troubles. For example, if You say ¡Follow me, I need You! Not follow you, and stay here forever.


RECOMENDACIÓN!!! Si ya lo tienes instalado, desinstalalo y vuelvelo a instalar(el actualizado) ya que dará problemas con una partida ya empezada..Lo advierto por si acaso...
Si no, puedes empezar una partida nueva, pero habrá quien tenga muy avanzado ya el juego y no quiera quitarlo por un mod. Quedais Avisados! :)

Bueno!!! Aquí os traigo un mod especial para aquellos personajes khajita que no quieren casarse con nórdicas o bretonas o tener que hacerlo con j'zhargo solamente.O utilizar comandos de consola.

Hay 3 preciosidades khajitas disponibles con voces diferentes.(aún no es perfecto) Y que encima te pueden entrenar cada una en lo suyo. Destrucción, abrir Cerraduras y en Discrección. Y además te puedes casar con ellas!
Cocinan, fo...n y hacen de todo xD

El MOD está sin terminar aún y necesito ayuda para saber que le funciona a gente con o sin mods(vanilla), ya que yo dispongo de una versión hypermodeada del juego original.

Yo utilizo SKSE, SkyUI y UFO+UFO Tweaks y My Home is Your Home, así que si funciona sin esos mods me gustaría saberlo.

Gracias y que lo disfrueis!


Se ecuentran las 3 en

TALI en La Yegua abanderada en Carrera Blanca!!!!! Entrena Abrir Cerraduras Hasta nivel 100

RIKA en Cuenca del Dragón!!!! Entrenadora de Discrección hasta nivel 100

LIARA en Cauce Boscoso En la posada del Gigante Dormido!!!!! Entrenadora Experta de destrucción hasta nivel 75

Se pueden Casar las 3 y puedes vivir con ellas si dispones de los mods necesarios. My Home Is Your Home y UFO.

Que las disfruteis!!! :-)

By MoRZiLLo & Renamon
author: MoRZiLLo

Added Optional file. New compliment MOD. Adds two new Khajitchildren. Cuteeeeeeeeeeee!!! :)
